name: The Mystery Doors
description:
The Mystery Doors is a game made in less than 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2015 / Global Shadow Jam.

You play a Princess with her Heroes in a dungeon which is being flooded.

To unlock the door leading upstairs, send one or more heroes to each room of the current floor.

Observe carefully the doors to know which one of your heroes should go in. If you decide to send more than one hero, they are more likely to succeed.

There are 8 floors, hurry up !

Credits :

Nicolas Regnault - Programming

Clément Chardevel - Programming

Florent Chardevel - Music

Kévin Ornon - User Experience

Andy Lobjois - Graphics

Axel Hébert - Project Management

Aurélien Picolet - Game Design and Sound Design
